text: Sound like some kdrama scene  still can be romantic 😂

This year just settle in SG. At the most raining but definitely not as cold.

2 policemen past by us as we took shelter under a building. They looked at us n were discussing. For a moment we thought they going to question us etc.. we wonder why.. then when rain stopped n we moved away then we realised that building we stopped for shelter was some embassy 😅
Very scared I come back & cane you is it?
